description:
Teleprompter is a surprisingly effective tool containing a large feature set and a fairly short learning curve.

It takes a little clicking around at first, but once you know how to manage your files and settings, everything else is right there.
summary: The more I use it, the more I like it!

description: We love this software. Since moving from windows to Linux as our main teleprompting system (starting a shoot with windows updates can be expensive and unprofessional!), we've used this. Handy features. You do need a powerful enough system, otherwise it will jump. Nothing too spectacular, just a good cpu and graphics. It just about runs on an old pentium D laptop with integrated graphics, but can be jumpy. On an i5 or i7 with a 2gb card or better, its smooth! Recommended.
summary: A powerful teleprompter that is easy to use and professional

description: Je viens de le tester sans presque rien changer aux réglages de base. Lecture confortable, simplicité, efficacité. Parfait pour réaliser des podcasts ou des commentaires sur vidéos et, sans doute, pour une conférence.
